body.name: Smart Video Doorbell Security Camera Outdoor Included Ring Chime, Wireless and Battery Powered, 2 Way Audio, Human Detection, Night Vision, Cloud Storage, for Indoor/Outdoor Surveillance
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 43 mins
features: Robust Cloud Storage Security: Experience AES-128 encrypted cloud storage with optional subscription plans (sold separately) for added convenience. Enjoy a 30-day free trial to explore recording, reviewing, and sharing your videos with ease.
Intelligent AI-Powered Human Detection: Activate the smart AI human detection feature to accurately identify people while disregarding other moving objects, ensuring precise security alerts.
All-Weather Resilience: IP65 dustproof and waterproof certification guarantees the video doorbell can endure rain, sun, heat, or snow, providing dependable security all year round.
Seamless Two-Way Communication: Effortlessly engage with visitors from anywhere, ensuring smooth interaction and enhanced security.
Cutting-Edge Night Vision: Equipped with six infrared lights and a smart IR sensor, monitor your home around the clock with clear, high-resolution video, even in low-light conditions.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Smart Video Doorbell Security Camera Included Chime

Video Doorbell Wireless with Chime Video Doorbell Wireless for Home Security with 2-Way Audio, Night Vision Seamless Two-Way Communication: Effortlessly engage with visitors, ensuring smooth interaction and enhanced security. Night Vision: Equipped with six infrared lights and a smart IR sensor, monitor your home around the clock with clear, high-resolution video, even in low-light conditions Intelligent AI Human Recognize: Activate the smart AI human recognize feature to accurately identify people while disregarding other moving objects, providing precise security alerts.

Seamless Two-Way Communication Effortlessly engage with visitors, ensuring smooth interaction and enhanced security. Device Sharing with Family The doorbell allows up to 8 users to gain access. Share the device with your family members to ensure everyone enjoys access. Doorbell Chime Each package comes with a chime, placeable anywhere in your dwelling. Connect multiple chimes to a single doorbell for enhanced alert zones. Easy to Installation You can effortlessly install your doorbell using the adhesive tape or the two screws that are provided.

AI-Powered Human Recognize Activate the smart AI human recognize feature to accurately identify people while disregarding other moving objects, providing precise security alerts Night Vision Equipped with infrared lights and a smart IR sensor, monitor your home around the clock with clear, even in low-light conditions All-Weather Resilience The video doorbell can endure rain, sun, heat, or snow, providing dependable security all year round. Robust Cloud Storage Security Experience AES-128 encrypted cloud storage with optional subscription plans (sold separately) for added convenience. Enjoy a 30-day trial.

Easy Installation and Usage Tips You can effortlessly install your doorbell using the adhesive tape or the two screws that are provided. Accessories: Doorbell Camera x 1, Rechargeable Battery x 2, USB Indoor Chime x 1, Adhesive Tape x 1, Screw Pack x 1, USB Charging Cablex 1, User Manual x 1

How much time does a fully charged doorbell camera last? On a full charge, the doorbell camera's battery should last from one to three months, but this will depend on how often it records. Heavier recording and frequent use of Live View will deplete the battery faster, leading to more frequent recharges. Is there an option to monitor the doorbell camera through a phone app? Certainly, accessing the video is feasible with the Aiwit app. Can this doorbell camera back up recorded videos to the cloud? Videos are saved only with a cloud service subscription, which includes a trial period. Should the service meet your needs, the subscription begins automatically after the trial, but cancellation is within the trial period if you’re dissatisfied. Will this doorbell camera work when connected to a 5GHz Wi-Fi network? Only 2.4G Wi-Fi is compatible with this doorbell camera. Separate your Wi-Fi into 2.4GHz and 5GHz networks with distinct names, and use the 2.4GHz for the camera. Do I have to have an SD card for this video doorbell? The doorbell camera doesn't take SD cards. It saves videos in the cloud.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Considering it’s on the fair side of affordable when it comes to a doorbell camera, the set up was easy and quick following along the given instructions that is. (Listed in instructions is model P8 but not listed in app, listed under N8 I believe) The video quality is relatively good also, clear for the most part and can hear everything so clear. The battery pretty solid also! This is definitely a great first time doorbell camera! That is until you wanted to upgrade later on down the road!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for first time doorbell camera users
reviews.reviewText: Someone stole my package last week so I decide to breakdown and get a simple doorbell camera, I definitely made an excellent choice, easy setup and very effective. Will purchase as gifts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Serviceable For a Great Price
reviews.reviewText: Good view, love the zoom feature, and the app has useful deals. The voice quality could be better.Otherwise it's a nice quality product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The video quality is great, you can decide how sensitive it is, the speed is also good. I love how affordable it is and how amazing it works I’ve never had a doorbell camera and if you wanna try it out and see how you like having one this is a great first try. 1000% recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for the price.
reviews.reviewText: Great product so far. Really liked how easy it was to set up. Not very technically intuitive but this was so simple.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Excellent, good video quality, the battery lasts a long time 100% recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This device delivers.
reviews.reviewText: Visual, Audio and set up was a breeze! Then proof of the pudding, very good! Device simply delivers on all fronts! Night vision, spot on! Talking to someone also, very good! They can hear u clearly and u can hear them! My only complaint is that it has no tamper detection and is not secure in its housing! If it had that feature then I would have given it 100%!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Man I been looking to get a doorbell camera for some time for a reasonable price and I got lucky with finding this great camera doorbell the camera works great when someone rings it you seriously need this doorbell camera
